import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { const featuredProducts = [ { id: 1, name: 'Summer T-Shirt', price: '$29.99', image: '/api/placeholder/300/300', category: 'men' }, { id: 2, name: 'Elegant Dress', price: '$49.99', image: '/api/placeholder/300/300', category: 'women' }, { id: 3, name: 'Kids Sneakers', price: '$39.99', image: '/api/placeholder/300/300', category: 'kids' }, ]; return (

Summer Collection 2024

Discover the latest trends in fashion for everyone

Shop Now

Shop by Category

Men

Women

Kids

Featured Products

{featuredProducts.map(product => (

{product.name}

{product.price}

))}
); }; export default Home;
